code: const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';const api={get:async path=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('firebaseToken');const res=await fetch(API_URL+path,{method:'GET',headers:{Authorization:token?"Bearer ".concat(token):'','Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(!res.ok){const errorText=await res.text();throw new Error("Erro na API: ".concat(res.status," - ").concat(errorText));}return res.json();}catch(err){console.error("Erro API:",err);throw err;}}};export default api;
